verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> followed <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and <S%H4444>Malchishua,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

The <S%H4421>battle<s%> went <S%H3513>hard<s%> against <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H4672>overtook<s%> <S%H2342>him;<s%> and he was distressed by reason of the <S%H3384>archers.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his armor <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> <S%H8025>"Draw<s%> your <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> me through with <S%H6189>it,<s%> lest these uncircumcised <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5953>abuse<s%> <S%H5375>me.<s%>" But his armor bearer <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3966>not;<s%> for he was <S%H3372>terrified.<s%> Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and fell on <S%H5307>it.<s%>
When his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> he likewise <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H4191>died.<s%>
So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and all his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

When all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who were in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and lived in <S%H3427>them.<s%>

It happened on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

They <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H5375>him,<s%> and took his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> to carry the <S%H1319>news<s%> to their <S%H6091>idols,<s%> and to the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
They <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H8628>fastened<s%> his <S%H1538>head<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon.<s%>
When all Jabesh <S%H3003>Gilead<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> all that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%>

all the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and took <S%H5375>away<s%> the <S%H1480>body<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H1480>bodies<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%> under the <S%H424>oak<s%> in <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> for his <S%H4604>trespass<s%> which he <S%H4603>committed<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H8104>didn't<s%> keep; and also because he <S%H7592>asked<s%> counsel of one who had a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire,<s%>

and <S%H1875>didn't<s%> inquire of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> therefore he <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H5437>him,<s%> and turned the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse.<s%>
